name: borer
content:

Add to word list
an insect that makes holes in plants, wood, etc.: The borer can cause the corn ear to fall off or can weaken the stalk so much that it breaks. a borer infestation
a tool or machine for making holes: A gimlet is a borer, used to make holes for nails. a robotic tunnel borer
